title: Analysis of Organizational Learning Influencing Factors: Interaction Between Culture and Technological Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational behavior theory, knowledge management theory, and foundational statistics
context.additional_context: Focuses on deep understanding of organizational learning mechanisms and empirical analysis methods for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Strengthens data analysis competencies using structural equation modeling and survey techniques in BYOD environments

learning_goals: The impact of organizational culture types (clan/hierarchy) on learning behaviors can be explained with empirical data.
The influence of knowledge and skill competencies on organizational learning outcomes can be analyzed using a structural equation model.
Large-scale survey design and data collection processes can be planned in an LMS-based online environment.

resources: Structural equation modeling software (AMOS/Partial Least Squares)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
